title: Short-Intensive Course on Humanities Research Competency Enhancement Using Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of philology and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Undergraduate students comprising professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, digital device-provided environment

learning_goals: The accuracy of classical text analysis is improved by over 30% using generative AI tools.
The ability to critically evaluate AI-generated materials and apply philological context is demonstrated.
A text interpretation process utilizing generative AI in real work environments is designed and executed.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
